Designed for professionals aiming to earn the Certified Penetration Testing Engineer (CPTE) credential or elevate their offensive security skills, this course delivers the expertise needed to perform high-impact assessments in live environments.

Includes 10 full-length practice exams. Test your skills under pressure and sharpen your readiness.

Step into the mindset of an attacker and gain the hands-on experience to uncover vulnerabilities before malicious actors do.

ceh_certifiedethicalhacker_10practiceexa.human_name: CEH: Certified Ethical Hacker with 10 Practice Exams
ceh_certifiedethicalhacker_10practiceexa.description_text:
Cybercriminals are constantly evolving—and so must the defenders who stop them. This course immerses you in the tools, tactics, and techniques used by hackers, giving you the skills to think like an adversary and fortify systems against real-world attacks.

Through hands-on labs and guided simulations, you’ll explore every phase of ethical hacking, from reconnaissance to exploitation, gaining practical experience with the same methods used in today’s cyber threats—only applied legally and ethically.

✅ Learn core ethical hacking methodologies to identify vulnerabilities before attackers do

✅ Use professional-grade tools to test networks, applications, and endpoint security

✅ Simulate real-world attack scenarios including malware analysis, social engineering, and privilege escalation

✅ Generate detailed reports that communicate risks and remediation strategies effectively

Built for those pursuing the Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH) credential or anyone looking to sharpen their offensive security skills, this program bridges theory with live, hands-on hacking practice in controlled environments.

Includes 10 full-length practice exams. Reinforce your skills and build confidence for the certification.

Develop the mindset and capabilities of an ethical hacker—and stay one step ahead of cybercriminals in an ever-changing threat landscape.

lpic3_expertsecuritycertification_10prac.human_name: EXPERT LPIC-3 Security Certification with 10 Practice Exams
lpic3_expertsecuritycertification_10prac.description_text:
Go beyond standard system hardening and master the art of Linux security at an enterprise scale.

This expert-level program dives deep into the methodologies required to design and implement robust, multi-layered security for any Linux-based environment, from bare metal servers to complex cloud deployments.

✅ Implement and manage advanced cryptographic controls for filesystems, network services, and user data

✅ Harden systems using mandatory access control frameworks like AppArmor and SELinux

✅ Secure network operations by mastering advanced firewalling, intrusion detection, and traffic analysis

✅ Develop procedures for proactive security auditing, vulnerability scanning, and forensic investigation

Whether you are a senior systems administrator, a DevOps engineer, or a security specialist, this course is designed to validate and expand your expertise in securing critical Linux infrastructure.

Includes 10 full-length practice exams. Sharpen your command of the details. Test under pressure.

If you're ready to prove your expertise and become a recognized authority in Linux security—this is your proving ground.

osth_offsecthreathunter_10practiceexams.human_name: OffSec Threat Hunter (OSTH) Certification with 10 Practice Exams
osth_offsecthreathunter_10practiceexams.description_text:
Automated alerts can only catch known threats. What about the adversaries who are already inside your network, moving silently? The OffSec Threat Hunter goes looking for them. This is proactive defense.

Learn to proactively identify and investigate potential intrusions by developing data-driven hypotheses, analyzing system and network artifacts, and tracking adversary TTPs (Tactics, Techniques, and Procedures).

✅ Understand how to leverage enterprise data sources—from endpoint logs and network traffic to memory analysis—to form a basis for your hunts.

✅ Learn to develop threat hypotheses based on common adversary behaviors and use them to conduct targeted searches for indicators of compromise.

✅ Go beyond simple indicators by learning to recognize and analyze attacker Tactics, Techniques, and Procedures (TTPs).

✅ Master the investigative workflow, from initial discovery and scoping of an incident to documenting and communicating your findings.

This advanced program is designed for experienced security professionals, such as SOC analysts and incident responders, who are ready to evolve from reactive defense to proactive hunting.

Includes 10 Practice Exam. Form your hypothesis. Follow the trail. Find the adversary.

If you're ready to stop waiting for alerts and start actively hunting down threats, this is your field guide to proactive defense.

comptia_dataplus_10practiceexams.description_text:
Every dataset tells a story. The challenge is knowing how to find it and how to tell it effectively. This program teaches you the complete data analysis lifecycle, from mining raw data to visualizing compelling insights.

Master the foundational skills of a data analyst, learning how to source and manipulate data, apply basic statistical methods, and create meaningful visualizations to communicate results.

✅ Understand core data concepts, different data types, and the importance of data governance and quality.

✅ Learn techniques for data mining and manipulation, including how to query and transform data for analysis.

✅ Explore the application of descriptive statistics and basic analytical techniques to uncover patterns in data.

✅ Master the principles of effective data visualization and learn how to build reports that clearly communicate insights.

Whether you're an aspiring analyst seeking your first role or a professional who needs to make data-driven decisions, this course provides the vendor-neutral, foundational skills to succeed.

Includes 10 full-length practice exams. Solidify your understanding of the analysis process. Prepare with confidence.

If you're ready to build the essential skills for a career in data and learn how to turn numbers into narrative, this course is your first chapter.

osccsjd_securejavadevelopment_10practice.human_name: OffSec CyberCore (OSCC-SJD) Secure Java Development Essentials Certification with 10 Practice Exams
osccsjd_securejavadevelopment_10practice.description_text:
You're a Java developer. You build applications that solve problems. But is the code you write secure? This program teaches you to think like an attacker so you can code like a defender, finding and fixing vulnerabilities before they ever reach production.

Learn to identify, understand, and mitigate common security vulnerabilities in Java applications, from input validation flaws to complex injection attacks, all through hands-on coding examples.

✅ Master secure input validation and output encoding techniques to prevent common injection attacks like SQL Injection and Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).

✅ Understand and implement proper authentication and authorization controls to protect sensitive data and functionality.

✅ Learn to manage application dependencies securely and avoid common misconfigurations that lead to compromise.

✅ Explore the risks of insecure deserialization and learn best practices for designing and securing Java APIs.

Whether you're a developer wanting to write more resilient code or a penetration tester needing to understand the Java attack surface, this program provides the essential, code-level security knowledge you need.

Includes 10 Practice Exam. Find the bug. Fix the flaw. Harden the code.

Secure code isn't an optional feature—it's a professional responsibility. If you're ready to build applications that are secure by design, your training starts here.

oswe_offsecwebexpert_10practiceexams.human_name: OffSec Web Expert Certification (OSWE) with 10 Practice Exams
oswe_offsecwebexpert_10practiceexams.description_text:
Black-box testing only shows you the symptoms. True web application mastery comes from understanding the cause—deep within the source code.

This expert-level program develops an advanced offensive mindset focused on identifying and chaining complex vulnerabilities through rigorous source code analysis and custom exploit development.

✅ Develop a systematic methodology for dissecting unfamiliar codebases in various web languages and frameworks

✅ Learn to identify subtle yet critical vulnerabilities, including advanced injection, authentication bypasses, and complex logic flaws

✅ Master the art of crafting custom exploits from scratch to bypass modern security mechanisms

✅ Practice chaining multiple vulnerabilities together to escalate a minor flaw into a complete system compromise

If you've mastered network penetration testing and black-box web attacks, this course is the next logical step, bridging the gap between using exploits and discovering them in the code itself.

Includes 10 challenging exam. Hone your code-auditing skills. Develop your exploits with precision.

If you're ready to move from finding vulnerabilities to understanding their origin and proving your elite status—this is your code review.

databricks_mlassociate_10practiceexams.description_text:
You understand the theory behind machine learning. But how do you apply it in a real-world, collaborative environment? This program teaches you the hands-on process for building, managing, and deploying ML models on the Databricks platform.

Learn the fundamentals of the machine learning lifecycle on Databricks, from data preparation and feature engineering to model training, evaluation, and experiment tracking with MLflow.

✅ Learn to perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) and scalable feature engineering to prepare data for machine learning.

✅ Understand and apply core machine learning models for classification and regression using tools like scikit-learn and Spark MLlib.

✅ Use MLflow Tracking to log experiments, compare model runs, and ensure the reproducibility of your results.

✅ Explore the basics of the model lifecycle, including model evaluation, selection, and an introduction to deployment concepts.

Whether you are a data scientist new to the Databracks ecosystem or an analyst looking to move into machine learning, this course provides the essential skills to manage the end-to-end ML process.

Includes 10 full-length practice exams. Solidify your understanding of the ML lifecycle. Build with confidence.

If you're ready to move from ML theory to hands-on practice and build a strong foundation for your machine learning career, this is your starting block.

google_mlengineer_genai_20practiceexams.human_name: Google Professional Machine Learning Engineer Certification with Generative AI and 20 Practice Exams
google_mlengineer_genai_20practiceexams.description_text:
The world of machine learning is evolving. The next frontier is Generative AI. This professional program prepares you not just for today's MLOps challenges, but for tomorrow's, by mastering the entire ML lifecycle on Google Cloud—including cutting-edge generative solutions.

Master the engineering principles for building robust and scalable ML systems on Google Cloud, from designing data processing pipelines and automating model training to deploying and monitoring both predictive and generative AI models.

✅ Frame business problems as ML problems and architect end-to-end solutions on GCP, choosing the right services for the job.

✅ Build scalable data processing and feature engineering pipelines using tools like BigQuery and Dataflow.

✅ Develop, train, and distribute models using Vertex AI Training and tune hyperparameters for optimal performance.

✅ Build solutions with Google's foundation models and automate the entire ML lifecycle using Vertex AI Pipelines and MLOps best practices.

This program is designed for experienced ML engineers and data scientists who want to demonstrate their expertise in building and managing production-level ML systems on Google Cloud.

Includes an extensive library of 20 full-length practice exams. Master the Google Cloud ecosystem. Engineer AI solutions with authority.

If you're ready to move beyond theoretical models and become an engineer who builds the future of AI on Google Cloud, this is your professional blueprint.

comptia_aplus_25hours_10practiceexams.human_name: Ultimate CompTIA A+ 25-HOUR Certification Bundle 2.0 with 10 Practice Exams
comptia_aplus_25hours_10practiceexams.description_text:
Your career in IT support starts right here. This isn't just a course—it's the ultimate, all-in-one bundle designed to take you from zero experience to CompTIA A+ certified and job-ready.

This complete 25-hour bundle provides everything you need to pass both the CompTIA A+ Core 1 and Core 2 exams, covering hardware, software, networking, security, and operational procedures.

✅ Master PC hardware, from motherboards and CPUs to storage and peripherals, and learn to troubleshoot common hardware issues.

✅ Understand the fundamentals of networking, including installing and configuring networks, and grasp the basics of virtualization and cloud computing.

✅ Install, configure, and troubleshoot a wide range of operating systems, including Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, and Android.

✅ Learn to identify and mitigate security threats and understand best practices for operational procedures and professional communication.

Whether you're aiming for your first job at a help desk, as a field technician, or in desktop support, this comprehensive program is the most direct path to the certification you need to get hired.

Includes 25+ hours of content and 10 full-length practice exams. Everything you need to study, practice, and pass.

If you're ready to stop waiting and start building your future in IT, the ultimate A+ preparation is right here. Your new career is one click away.

databricks_dataengineerassociate_10pract.human_name: Databricks Certified Data Engineer Associate Exam Preparation with 10 Practice Exams
databricks_dataengineerassociate_10pract.description_text:
Raw data can be messy and unreliable. The modern data engineer transforms that chaos into clean, trusted, and performant data assets ready for analytics and AI. This is where you learn that craft.

This program teaches you to design, build, and manage robust data processing pipelines using core components of the Databricks Lakehouse Platform, including Delta Lake, Spark SQL, and production job orchestration.

✅ Understand the Databricks Lakehouse architecture and use its core components for data management and governance.

✅ Develop and optimize ETL/ELT pipelines using Spark SQL and Delta Lake to ensure data quality and reliability.

✅ Learn to build production-grade data pipelines, including managing tables, views, and incremental data processing.

✅ Deploy and monitor data processing jobs using Databricks Workflows and effectively manage production environments.

This course is designed for data professionals, BI developers, and ETL engineers who want to build and certify their skills as a data engineer on the Databricks platform.

Includes 10 full-length practice exams. Solidify your understanding of the Lakehouse. Engineer with confidence.

If you're ready to build the reliable data foundations that power business intelligence and AI, this course is your engineering blueprint.

securityopsanalyst_microsoftcert_10pract.human_name: Microsoft Certified: Security Operations Analyst Associate with 10 Practice Exams
securityopsanalyst_microsoftcert_10pract.description_text:
In today’s threat landscape, it’s not enough to simply understand security concepts—you need the skills to respond decisively when attacks happen. This course immerses you in real-world scenarios that sharpen your ability to identify, investigate, and neutralize threats using Microsoft’s industry-leading security solutions.

Through guided labs and practical exercises, you’ll learn to think like a security analyst—tracking down malicious activity, containing breaches, and strengthening enterprise defenses against evolving risks.

✅ Master threat detection and response using Microsoft Sentinel and Microsoft Defender

✅ Analyze attack patterns and malicious activity with data-driven investigation techniques

✅ Harden cloud and hybrid environments through proactive security monitoring and remediation

✅ Refine incident handling and escalation procedures in live, time-sensitive simulations

Whether you’re aiming to earn the Microsoft Security Operations Analyst Associate certification (SC-200) or elevate your effectiveness in a SOC role, this course provides the hands-on experience you need to excel in real-world environments.

Includes 10 full-length practice exams. Build confidence through hands-on labs and scenario-driven exercises.

Step beyond theory and develop the practical expertise required to defend enterprise networks against today’s most pressing cyber threats.

klcp_kalilinuxcertifiedprofessional_10pr.human_name: OffSec Kali Linux Certified Professional (KLCP) Certification with 10 Practice Exams
klcp_kalilinuxcertifiedprofessional_10pr.description_text:
Learn to professionally manage, customize, and troubleshoot the Kali Linux environment, ensuring you have a stable, performant, and optimized platform for all your security assessment work.

✅ Master Kali Linux system administration, including managing services, users, permissions, and the underlying Debian package management system.

✅ Learn to customize and re-build the Kali Linux ISO, creating tailored versions of the OS for specific engagement needs.

✅ Go beyond apt install: learn to compile tools from source, manage different versions of tools, and ensure your toolkit is always ready.

✅ Automate common tasks and streamline your workflow with Bash scripting and a deep understanding of the Kali environment.

Before you learn to attack the targets, you must first master your own system. This certification is the logical starting point for anyone pursuing advanced OffSec certifications like the OSCP.

Includes 10 Practice Exam. Configure the system. Customize the tools. Command the OS.

Don't let your OS be a barrier to your success. If you're ready to build a deep, professional mastery of your primary security toolkit, this is your official guide.

oswa_offsecwebassessor_10practiceexams.human_name: OffSec Web Assessor (OSWA) Certification with 10 Practice Exams
oswa_offsecwebassessor_10practiceexams.description_text:
This program teaches you the manual, methodical process of assessing modern web applications to uncover the critical vulnerabilities that put businesses at risk.

Master the end-to-end workflow of a web application penetration tester, from reconnaissance and mapping to identifying, exploiting, and reporting on a wide range of common vulnerabilities.

✅ Learn to perform thorough reconnaissance and application mapping to understand the target's attack surface and technology stack.

✅ Master techniques to identify and exploit various injection vulnerabilities, including SQL Injection, NoSQL Injection, and Command Injection.

✅ Explore common client-side vulnerabilities like Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF), and insecure session management.

✅ Learn to uncover and exploit broken access control mechanisms, business logic flaws, and insecure direct object references (IDORs).

Whether you're an OSCP holder wanting to specialize in web attacks or a developer looking to understand the offensive mindset, this course provides the definitive, hands-on training for web pentesting.

Includes 10 Practice Exam. Map the app. Find the flaw. Demonstrate the impact.

If you're ready to move beyond automated scans and become the human expert who can systematically break down a web application's defenses, this is your assessment plan.

comptiasecurityxcas-00517-hourexpert-lev.human_name: EXPERT CompTIA SecurityX 17-HOUR Certification with 10 Practice Exams
comptiasecurityxcas-00517-hourexpert-lev.description_text:
You've mastered the tools and you understand the threats. Now it's time to lead the strategy. This EXPERT-level program is for the senior professional who designs, architects, and manages an entire enterprise security program.

Master the strategic principles of cybersecurity leadership, learning to integrate risk management, compliance, and security architecture into a cohesive, enterprise-wide security posture.

✅ Design and implement comprehensive security governance frameworks and lead enterprise-wide risk management initiatives.

✅ Architect secure, resilient enterprise networks and cloud/hybrid environments, integrating security throughout the design.

✅ Develop and lead a mature security operations program, including advanced threat intelligence and incident response strategies.

✅ Analyze industry trends and translate technical data into business risk intelligence to guide executive decisions.

If you have extensive experience in security operations, engineering, or analysis, this course provides the strategic framework to bridge the gap between technical mastery and executive-level security leadership.

Includes 17+ hours of expert instruction and 10 full-length practice exams. Move beyond tactics. Master security strategy.

If you're ready to prove you have the vision and expertise to lead an enterprise security program, this is your architectural master plan.

databricks_sparkdeveloper_10practiceexam.human_name: Databricks Certified Apache Spark Developer Exam Preparation with 10 Practice Exams
databricks_sparkdeveloper_10practiceexam.description_text:
Processing massive datasets is a real engineering challenge. To do it efficiently, you need to master the industry standard for distributed computing: Apache Spark.

This program teaches you to build reliable and performant data processing applications by mastering the fundamentals of the Spark architecture and its core programming APIs, including the DataFrame API and Spark SQL.

✅ Understand the fundamentals of the Spark architecture, including how applications are executed on a cluster.

✅ Learn to perform core data manipulation tasks using the DataFrame API, including selecting, filtering, and aggregating data.

✅ Work with complex data types, handle missing data, and join multiple DataFrames to answer sophisticated questions.

✅ Use Spark SQL and a wide range of built-in functions to query and transform data effectively.

Whether you are a data engineer building ETL pipelines or a data scientist performing large-scale data analysis, this course provides the foundational Spark knowledge required to work with big data effectively.

Includes 10 full-length practice exams. Solidify your understanding of the Spark APIs. Code with confidence.

If you're ready to prove your ability to handle large-scale data processing challenges and build a core skill for any data role, this course is your developer guide.

lpic1_linuxadministrator_10practiceexams.human_name: LPIC-1 Certification: Linux Administrator with 10 Practice Exams
lpic1_linuxadministrator_10practiceexams.description_text:
From the world's supercomputers to the cloud and from web servers to smart devices, Linux is everywhere. Isn't it time you learned how to command it?

This course gives you the essential, hands-on skills to confidently work from the command line, perform real-world system administration tasks, and build a solid foundation for a career in tech.

✅ Master the Linux command line, manage file systems, and understand the core system architecture.

✅ Learn to install software, write simple shell scripts, and manage running system processes.

✅ Confidently manage user accounts, groups, and file permissions in a multi-user environment.

✅ Configure basic network settings and understand essential security and system services.

Whether you're aiming to become a systems administrator or a developer who needs to work in a Linux environment, this course builds the vendor-neutral skills that modern tech roles require.

Includes 10 full-length practice exams. Build your command-line muscle. Test your knowledge.

If you're ready to stop being intimidated by the terminal and start your journey to Linux mastery—this is your launchpad.

csslp_securelifecyclecertification_10pra.human_name: CSSLP: Certified Secure Software Lifecycle Professional with 10 Practice Exams
csslp_securelifecyclecertification_10pra.description_text:
Dive into comprehensive, practical preparation for the Certified Secure Software Lifecycle Professional (CSSLP) exam, covering all essential objectives for integrating security into software design, development, and deployment.

✅ Master Secure Software Fundamentals – Understand core security principles and their role in modern development.

✅ Integrate Security into the SDLC – Apply secure practices in planning, design, development, testing, and deployment.

✅ Define and Implement Secure Requirements – Document and enforce security standards from the ground up.

✅ Architect & Build Secure Software – Design resilient systems and write code that mitigates vulnerabilities.

✅ Test & Validate Security – Perform thorough testing to identify, analyze, and remediate risks early.

✅ Secure Deployment & Maintenance – Operate and maintain secure applications in production environments.

✅ Protect the Software Supply Chain – Reduce third-party and dependency risks.

Includes 10 FREE full-length practice exams. Build hands-on skills and test your readiness for the real CSSLP exam.

Limited spots! Enroll now.

osed_offsecexpertdeveloper_10practiceexa.human_name: OffSec Expert Developer Certification (OSED) with 10 Practice Exams
osed_offsecexpertdeveloper_10practiceexa.description_text:
A simple buffer overflow is a solved problem. But what do you do when faced with ASLR, DEP, and other modern memory protections? This is where true exploit development begins.

This elite program dives deep into the art of Windows exploit development, teaching you to bypass modern memory protections, write custom shellcode, and turn complex vulnerabilities into reliable code execution.

✅ Master techniques to bypass Data Execution Prevention (DEP) using sophisticated Return-Oriented Programming (ROP) chains.

✅ Learn to defeat Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) through memory leaks and information disclosure vulnerabilities.

✅ Write position-independent shellcode from scratch to overcome character restrictions and environmental constraints.

✅ Explore advanced 32-bit and 64-bit exploit creation, including structured exception handler (SEH) overwrites.

If you've mastered the art of penetration testing and want to go deeper than ever before, this course represents the pinnacle of offensive training, focusing purely on the craft of exploit creation.

Includes 10 practice exams. Master the debugger. Control the execution flow.

If you're ready to stop using exploits and start creating them—this is your disassembler.

lpic2_linuxengineer_10practiceexams.human_name: LPIC-2 Certification: Linux Engineer with 10 Practice Exams
lpic2_linuxengineer_10practiceexams.description_text:
You know how to administer a Linux system. Now it's time to engineer one. Go beyond daily tasks and learn to design and manage complex, mission-critical Linux infrastructure.

This advanced program dives deep into Linux systems engineering, covering kernel management, advanced storage, and the configuration of essential network services that power the enterprise.

✅ Perform advanced system administration, including Linux kernel management, system startup, and performance tuning.

✅ Configure and manage advanced storage solutions like RAID, LVM, and iSCSI for optimal performance and resilience.

✅ Master advanced network configuration, client management (DHCP, LDAP), and domain name resolution (DNS).

✅ Configure and secure critical network services, including web servers, file sharing (Samba, NFS), and email relays.

If you've mastered the fundamentals of Linux administration, this course is your pathway to a senior role, providing the deep technical knowledge needed to manage mixed-network environments at scale.

Includes 10 full-length practice exams. Deepen your systems knowledge. Engineer with confidence.

If you're ready to move from managing systems to architecting them and becoming an indispensable Linux expert—this is your engineering schematic.

oswp_offsecwirelessprofessional_10practi.human_name: OffSec Wireless Professional (OSWP) with 10 Practice Exams
oswp_offsecwirelessprofessional_10practi.description_text:
Wireless networks are a common feature of modern enterprise environments, each presenting a unique attack surface. This program explores the methodologies used to assess their security.

This program provides a focused overview of common wireless security protocols and the techniques used to identify and analyze their potential weaknesses.

✅ Review the fundamentals of 802.11 networking and the various wireless security standards.

✅ Discuss techniques for capturing and analyzing wireless network traffic to gather information.

✅ Cover common vulnerabilities and misconfigurations found in wireless network implementations.

✅ Explore the tools and processes involved in conducting a wireless security audit.

This program is designed for security professionals and network administrators who wish to gain a deeper understanding of wireless network security assessment.

Includes 10 Practice Exams. Review key concepts. Test your understanding of the material.

For individuals seeking a structured approach to the specific challenges of wireless network security, this course provides a focused path for study.

osir_offsecincidentresponder_10practicee.human_name: OffSec Incident Responder (OSIR) Certification with 10 Practice Exams
osir_offsecincidentresponder_10practicee.description_text:
The breach has happened. The clock is ticking. Every decision matters. The OffSec Incident Responder is trained to take control of the chaos, contain the threat, and restore order under pressure.

Master the technical workflow for incident response, from initial analysis and containment to threat eradication and post-incident recovery, all with an OffSec, adversary-aware perspective.

✅ Learn to rapidly analyze live systems and network data to identify malicious activity and determine the scope of a breach.

✅ Explore effective technical strategies for containing an active threat, isolating compromised systems, and preventing further lateral movement.

✅ Master the process of eradicating an adversary from the network and recovering systems to a secure, operational state.

✅ Understand and apply principles of live digital forensics to collect critical evidence during an active response.

This program is designed for cybersecurity practitioners on the front lines, including SOC analysts, system administrators, and CSIRT members who are responsible for responding to security incidents.

Includes 10 Practice Exam. Analyze the attack. Contain the damage. Take back the network.

In a crisis, some people run from the fire. The Incident Responder runs towards it. If you're ready to be the expert who brings order to chaos, this is your playbook.

cybersecurityarchitectexpert_microsoftce.human_name: Microsoft Certified: Cybersecurity Architect Expert with 10 Practice Exams
cybersecurityarchitectexpert_microsoftce.description_text:
Modern enterprises face increasingly sophisticated threats, demanding security professionals who can architect solutions that scale and adapt. This course develops your ability to design advanced, integrated security frameworks that protect organizations across cloud, hybrid, and on-premises environments.

You’ll work through high-impact scenarios that mirror real-world challenges, learning how to translate business requirements into actionable security strategies while balancing performance, compliance, and cost.

✅ Design and implement end-to-end security strategies aligned with business objectives

✅ Integrate Microsoft security solutions across identity, data, applications, and infrastructure

✅ Address regulatory and compliance requirements while maintaining operational efficiency

✅ Lead cross-functional security initiatives and establish governance for enterprise environments

Built for experienced professionals aiming to earn the Microsoft Certified: Cybersecurity Architect Expert (SC-100) credential, this program also equips you to lead security planning, decision-making, and implementation within complex enterprise systems.

Includes 10 full-length practice exams. Validate your expertise and prepare with confidence.

Step into the role of a cybersecurity architect and gain the advanced skills to design strategies that safeguard organizations at scale.

osep_offsecexperiencedpentester_10practi.human_name: OffSec Experienced Pentester Certification (OSEP) with 10 Practice Exams
osep_offsecexperiencedpentester_10practi.description_text:
Finding vulnerabilities is one thing. But what happens when you face a hardened network with modern defenses, custom applications, and vigilant defenders? That's where true tradecraft begins.

This advanced course teaches you to think like a persistent adversary by mastering the art of defense evasion, custom payload creation, and lateral movement in highly secured corporate environments.

✅ Master techniques to bypass antivirus (AV) and application whitelisting solutions like AppLocker.

✅ Learn advanced lateral movement and credential abuse techniques to navigate fully patched networks.

✅ Develop custom tooling and modify public exploits to succeed where off-the-shelf tools fail.

✅ Explore sophisticated client-side attacks, process injection methods, and stealthy command-and-control tactics.

If you're ready to move beyond the ""Try Harder"" mindset into the realm of ""Think Smarter,"" this course bridges the gap between traditional pentesting and advanced adversary simulation.

Includes 10 free exams. Refine your tradecraft. Execute with stealth.

If you're ready to stop being stopped by modern defenses and think like a true adversary—this is your operator's manual.

extralife.human_name: Extra Life / Children's Miracle Network Hospitals
extralife.description_text:
Donations to support Extra Life / Children's Miracle Network Hospitals are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Extra Life is a Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals fundraising program that empowers the gaming community to make a difference in the lives of local sick and injured kids. Participants fundraise year-round and during a 24-hour gaming marathon each fall.

Getting involved is as easy as signing up online at extra-life.org, asking your friends and family to donate, and pledging to play games in support of the Children’s Miracle Network Hospital of your choice. You can play from the comfort of your own home, playing any game you want.

Since 2008, Extra Life has raised more than $75 million for member hospitals. Play games, heal kids and join the community today at www.extra-life.org.

cissp_informationsystemssecuritypro_10pr.human_name: CISSP: Certified Information Systems Security Professional with 10 Practice Exams
cissp_informationsystemssecuritypro_10pr.description_text:
Technical skills can only take you so far. To truly lead in cybersecurity, you need to speak the language of risk, policy, and business alignment.

This definitive program helps you develop the broad, management-level perspective required to design, engineer, and manage a complete information security program for any organization.

✅ Master the core principles of security governance, risk management, and compliance frameworks

✅ Understand the fundamentals of security architecture, engineering, and cryptography

✅ Grasp the key concepts of Identity and Access Management (IAM) and securing daily operations

✅ Explore security assessment strategies and how to integrate security into the software development lifecycle (SDLC)

Whether you're an aspiring CISO, a security manager, or a senior consultant, this course helps synthesize your hands-on experience into the strategic framework required for the CISSP exam.

Includes comprehensive study materials and full-length practice exams. Learn the concepts. Think like a manager.

If you're ready to earn the gold standard in cybersecurity certification and unlock the next stage of your career—this is your comprehensive briefing.

osda_offsecdefenseanalyst_10practiceexam.human_name: OffSec Defense Analyst (OSDA) Certification with 10 Practice Exams
osda_offsecdefenseanalyst_10practiceexam.description_text:
An attacker's campaign is a series of seemingly unrelated events: a log entry here, a network connection there. The OffSec Defense Analyst is the one who connects the dots. This program teaches you to see the full picture by analyzing the evidence an attacker leaves behind.

Learn to deconstruct cyber-attacks by performing deep analysis of network traffic, endpoint logs, and malware artifacts to identify attacker Tactics, Techniques, and Procedures (TTPs).

✅ Master the art of log analysis, correlating events from various sources like firewalls, web servers, and operating systems to build an attack timeline.

✅ Learn to dissect packet captures (PCAP) to identify malicious communications, command-and-control (C2) channels, and data exfiltration.

✅ Analyze filesystem and memory artifacts from compromised Windows and Linux endpoints to uncover persistence mechanisms and user activity.

✅ Perform basic static and dynamic analysis of malware samples to understand their capabilities and extract critical indicators of compromise (IOCs).

This program is for blue team members, including SOC analysts and junior incident responders, who want to move beyond triaging alerts and develop deep analytical skills.

Includes 10 Practice Exam. Analyze the evidence. Reconstruct the attack. Uncover the truth.

In cybersecurity, knowledge is power. If you're ready to become the analyst who provides that knowledge and turns data into defense, this is your analyst's handbook.

rhce_redhatcertifiedengineer_10practicee.human_name: RHCE: Red Hat Certified Engineer with 10 Practice Exams
rhce_redhatcertifiedengineer_10practicee.description_text:
Managing one server is a task. Managing hundreds is an engineering challenge. The modern Red Hat Certified Engineer solves this challenge with one critical skill: automation.

This advanced program teaches you how to use Ansible to automate the provisioning, configuration, and management of Red Hat Enterprise Linux systems, transforming repetitive tasks into reliable, repeatable playbooks.

✅ Understand core Ansible concepts, from managing inventories and running ad hoc commands to controlling task execution.

✅ Write and manage complex Ansible Playbooks using a wide range of modules, variables, conditions, and loops.

✅ Create and work with Ansible Roles to develop reusable, organized, and shareable automation content.

✅ Use Ansible Vault to manage secrets, work with Jinja2 templates for dynamic configurations, and manage automation at scale.

If you are an RHCSA or an experienced Linux administrator ready for the next challenge, this course is your bridge from hands-on system administration to scalable systems engineering through automation.

Includes 10 full-length practice exams. Develop your Ansible skills. Automate with confidence.

If you're ready to stop managing systems one-by-one and start engineering solutions at scale, this course provides the automation training you need.

databricks_dataengineerpro_10practiceexa.human_name: Databricks Certified Data Engineer Professional Exam Preparation with 10 Practice Exams
databricks_dataengineerpro_10practiceexa.description_text:
Building a data pipeline is one thing. Engineering an enterprise-grade data platform that is performant, reliable, and secure at scale is another. This is the next level of data engineering.

Go beyond basic ETL and learn to design and implement sophisticated data solutions, mastering advanced optimization techniques, complex data modeling strategies, and robust governance controls on the Databricks platform.

✅ Design and implement advanced data modeling solutions, including medallion architecture best practices and schema evolution.

✅ Master deep optimization techniques for Spark and Delta Lake, from advanced partitioning strategies to file compaction.

✅ Implement robust data governance and security using Unity Catalog, including data lineage and fine-grained access control.

✅ Learn to troubleshoot complex production failures, monitor pipeline performance, and leverage advanced tooling like the Spark UI.

For the senior data engineer tasked with leading projects and making critical architectural decisions, this course provides the expert-level knowledge needed to design and maintain a world-class data platform.

Includes 10 advanced, scenario-based practice exams. Refine your architectural thinking. Optimize with precision.

If you're ready to move from building pipelines to architecting enterprise data solutions and validating your place as a leader in the field, this is your professional-grade schematic.

linux_essentials_10practiceexams.human_name: The Complete Linux Essentials Certification with 10 Practice Exams
linux_essentials_10practiceexams.description_text:
Ready to take your very first step into the world of Linux? This course is designed for the absolute beginner, demystifying the command line and giving you the confidence to start your journey with open-source technology.

Gain a fundamental understanding of the Linux operating system, learning about its history, how it's used in the real world, and how to perform basic tasks using the command line.

✅ Understand the basics of the Linux operating system, its history, and the philosophy of open-source software.

✅ Learn how to navigate the file system, create and manage files, and find your way around the command line.

✅ Work with fundamental commands to view text files, compress data, and get help when you're stuck.

✅ Grasp the basic concepts of users, groups, and file permissions to see how a Linux system works.

Whether you're a student preparing for a tech career, a professional who needs to interact with Linux systems, or simply curious about open-source, this course is your gentle introduction.

Includes 10 full-length practice exams. Reinforce the basic concepts. Build your confidence for the exam.

If you're ready to open the door to one of the most important technologies in the world, your journey starts here.

extralife.description_text:
Donations to support Extra Life / Children's Miracle Network Hospitals are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Extra Life is a Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals fundraising program that empowers the gaming community to make a difference in the lives of local sick and injured kids. Participants fundraise year-round and during a 24-hour gaming marathon each fall.

Getting involved is as easy as signing up online at extra-life.org, asking your friends and family to donate, and pledging to play games in support of the Children’s Miracle Network Hospital of your choice. You can play from the comfort of your own home, playing any game you want.

Since 2008, Extra Life has raised more than $75 million for member hospitals. Play games, heal kids and join the community today at www.extra-life.org.
extralife.human_name: Extra Life / Children's Miracle Network Hospitals

from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get OffSec Web Expert Certification (OSWE) with 10 Practice Exams, OffSec Expert Developer Certification (OSED) with 10 Practice Exams, Get Microsoft Certified as an Azure AI Engineer Associate with 10 Practice Exams, and more!

basic_data.human_name: Point Blank Bundle
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Grab your guns, bullets, and wits— it’s time to feel the adrenaline rush of fantastic shooters with the Point Blank Bundle! This action-packed collection of FPS and TPS hits from top indie publishers features the tactically-sound and realistic EXFIL, the surreal alien invasion sim High on Life, and the wacky roguelike FPS Wild Bastards. Pay what you want for an amazing library of shooters and help support the American Civil Liberties Union.
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Shooters in every size and flavor
basic_data.description:
Shooters in every size and flavor. Grab your guns, bullets, and wits— it’s time to feel the adrenaline rush of fantastic shooters with the Point Blank Bundle! This action-packed collection of FPS and TPS hits from top indie publishers features the tactically-sound and realistic EXFIL, the surreal alien invasion sim High on Life, and the wacky roguelike FPS Wild Bastards. Pay what you want for an amazing library of shooters and help support the American Civil Liberties Union.

Pay $7 or more. Normally, the total cost for the games in this bundle is as much as $176. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $7 purchase. Pay $7 or more to access Steam keys.

Redeem on Steam. All of the games in this bundle are available on Steam for Windows — and some for Mac and Linux too. Please review the system requirements here prior to purchasing.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publishers and to support American Civil Liberties Union. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

risingfront.callout:
A realistic first-person shooter focused on historical WWI combat. (Steam Deck Playable)

90% Positive on Steam
risingfront.description_text:
Rising Front, a groundbreaking World War 1 shooter, plunges you into the heart of trench warfare. Experience a seamless fusion of FPS, RTS, and combat simulation. Our mission is to bring WW1 battles to life, populating the battlefield with hundreds, if not thousands, of units, all striving for victory.

Epic Scale of Battle

Unprecedented in its scope, Rising Front facilitates engagements with 1000+ units in action simultaneously. Step into an era never before so vividly recreated in a WW1 game!

Key Features
  • Realistic WW1 Tactics: Master the art of war from a century ago.
  • Highly Optimized: Smooth performance, regardless of the battle's scale.
  • Artillery: Utilize a range of artillery for a strategic advantage.
  • Procedural Cover System: Adaptive environment for tactical gameplay.
  • Rag-Doll Physics: Experience dynamic and impactful combat scenarios.
  • AI Commanding: Direct AI units for a strategic edge.
  • Building System: Construct defenses to fortify your position.

Welcome to the trenches. Welcome to Rising Front.

americancivillibertiesunion.description_text:
Donations to support the American Civil Liberties Union Foundation, Inc. (ACLU) are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

For nearly 100 years, the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) has been our nation's guardian of liberty, working in courts, legislatures, and communities to defend and preserve the individual rights and liberties that the Constitution and the laws of the United States guarantee everyone in this country. Whether it's achieving full equality for LGBT people, establishing new privacy protections for our digital age of widespread government surveillance, ending mass incarceration, or preserving the right to vote or the right to have an abortion, the ACLU takes up the toughest civil liberties cases and issues to defend all people from government abuse and overreach. With more than 2 million members, activists, and supporters, the ACLU is a nationwide organization that fights tirelessly in all 50 states, Puerto Rico, and Washington, D.C., to safeguard everyone's rights.

superhot_mindcontroldelete.callout:
A stylish shooter where time moves only when you move. (Steam Deck Playable)

86% Positive on Steam
superhot_mindcontroldelete.description_text:
SUPERHOT: MIND CONTROL DELETE  is the first person shooter where time m░ves only w▒en you move. No regen▒rati░g he▀lth bars. No conv▒nie▄tly pla▒ed am▄o dr▄p█▒■ YOU SHOULDN’T BE HERE. YOU HAVE ALREADY WON. 

The long-awaited third game in the groundbreaking SUPERHOT franchise - MIND CONTROL DELETE gives you more insight into the world of SUPERHOT, more story, more signature gameplay. Keep dancing the slow-motion ballet of destruction for so much longer than ever before. 

You amass an arsenal of new skills and new weapons. Time moves only when you move. Enemies pour in from every direction. You are in complete control as you shoot, slice, and explode your way through dozens and dozens of increasingly challenging combat encounters. The closer you get to the core, the more powerful you become. You uncover snippets of precious knowledge - of the meaning that you crave so much.

You shoot and slice. You move forward. You repeat. You repeat. You repeat. It becomes a ritual. It starts to mean something again. You take a moment to consider. You’ve been here before. So many times. Maybe this time it will actually mean something. Everything explodes into action. You hope this time will be different.

Built on the foundations of SUPERHOT and SUPERHOT VR, MIND CONTROL DELETE continues to bring you more of SUPERHOT’s signature power fantasy. 

MIND CONTROL DELETE features: 

  • Much bigger than its predecessors. MCD immerses you in its world for days of increasingly explosive slow motion combat. 

  • More mechanics at your disposal than ever before. Experiment with different play styles, different character builds, different ways to outsmart and dominate your enemies.

  • More power to accumulate as you progress through the game. Amass skills, hacks, special techniques to conquer waves of ever more dangerous enemies. 

  • More characters for you to control and for your enemies to throw at you. Test your arsenal of tricks and weapons against increasingly deadlier, smarter foes.

  • More polish applied over nearly four years of Early Access development. MCD offers a more refined, sharper, flashier experience than any SUPERHOT so far.

  • More meaning?

Is this VR? Will this be VR?

MCD is a regular, non-VR title. It’s designed for conventional screens and longer play sessions. If you played and enjoyed SUPERHOT VR, you’ll have a blast playing the original SUPERHOT and MCD as well.

emptyshell.callout:
Survive a procedurally generated nightmare in a roguelike horror shooter. (Steam Deck Unverified)

88% Positive on Steam
emptyshell.description_text:
EMPTY SHELL will throw you in a dark industrial environment, a secret facility on a Japanese island in the middle of nowhere. Each volunteer has signed a contract for a "recovery operation" without being privy to too many details.

They said the facility had been abandoned for decades, but once in place it was immediately apparent that something was wrong.
Discover the dark secrets of the facility's years of operation, up until the accident that led to the extreme consequences you are involved in.

Every time you die, you will control a new volunteer sent to the place. Your starting equipment will be randomized and each level will be generated with a new layout.

Dark corridors and cold rooms. Abominable creatures and bloody fights. Puzzles to solve, equipment, logs and documents to recover await you in this roguelite survival horror.
  • Random generated maps every time you enter a new level or you die
  • A top down perspective surrounded by darkness
  • Scavenge weapons, ammo and gadgets to raise your chance to survive
  • Manage your inventory to make room for what you deem vital
  • Different types of enemies will hunt you down each room of the facility
  • Buy upgrades and devices to help you during fights
  • Find logs and documents from the 1950s to unveil the stories of the people who worked there

exfil.callout:
A high-tech extraction shooter with a focus on immersive, realistic gunplay. (Steam Deck Unverified)

70% Positive on Steam
exfil.description_text:
What is EXFIL?

EXFIL delivers a distilled, authentic tactical experience where every match challenges your decision-making, teamwork and situational awareness. Built for players who value realism, EXFIL strips away grinding, magical perks and ‘gear fear’ to focus on pure tactical combat at infantry level.
Game Modes

EXFIL’s objective-based gameplay is fast-paced and straight to the point, offering infantry combat that balances realism with accessibility. Whether playing solo, teaming up with friends, or squaring off against other players, you’ll experience scenarios that demand tight communication, calculated movement, and sharp tactical skills.
It’s not just other players you’ll have to contend with - local forces are organized into squads that dynamically patrol, guard key locations, and actively hunt down threats across the map, keeping every match unpredictable and dangerous.
The Early Access release includes four intense extraction game modes:
• Classic Extraction: Compete to secure intel and escape. Only one team will make it out alive.

• Rogue Extraction: A high-stakes asymmetrical mode where a small rogue team of must outmaneuver a larger force to escape with valuable intel.

• Search And Destroy: One team must work together to locate and destroy multiple anti-air defense systems positioned across the map, while the opposing team’s objective is to protect these assets at all costs.

• VIP: One team must defend their high-value target, while the opposing team’s mission is to locate and eliminate the VIP before the match ends. 
Immersive and Dynamic Environments

Fight across seven handcrafted maps featuring dense forests, industrial zones, military camps and tropical jungles. With a 24-hour day/night cycle and fully simulated weather systems, matches are always unpredictable and ever-changing. Sandstorms, fog, and rainstorms will push your adaptability and ‘on-the-fly’ team tactics to the limit.
Hardcore Realism, No Nonsense

EXFIL’s fully simulated ballistics model accounts for bullet drop, penetration and ricochet. Combine this with realistic player movement, weapon handling, and VOIP-enhanced communication - including proximity chat, and every match becomes a test of skill and strategy.
A Sandbox of Possibilities

EXFIL is more than just its core game modes. Players have the freedom to customize their experience by adjusting a wide range of game parameters - from AI presence on the map to time of day, weather, available weapons, and respawn rules - allowing them to create unique challenges, and playstyles to suit any preference.

postal_braindamaged.callout:
A frantic and over-the-top retro-inspired shooter with chaotic humor. (Steam Deck Verified)

96% Positive on Steam
postal_braindamaged.description_text:
Get ready to experience POSTAL from a brand-new perspective!
This boomer-shooter spin-off of the fan-beloved Running With Scissors’ franchise will take you further down the rabbit hole than any previous game of the series. You’re not in Paradise anymore, and things are about to get weird, as POSTAL: Brain Damaged happens within the twisted psyche of the POSTAL DUDE, himself! Yes, a whole new, retro-modern, action-oriented, skill-based approach to POSTAL . " Did HYPERSTRANGE pull it off " - you might ask. Oh, yes. It seems we did:

Wild setting? Even wilder gameplay! While staying true to POSTAL’S trademark tone and humor the game plays very different to all the previous titles in the series. What you get is fast, challenging, and full of varied, meticulously designed enemies and environments. If you’re surfing the tidal wave of throwback shooters or enjoyed the latest installment of that game where you single-handily take on the forces of Hell invading Earth, you will feel right at home (even more so if your home smells really bad).

Make sure your body is ready to:
  • Explore an all-new, hand-crafted world full of surprises
  • Experience the challenging, fast-paced gameplay with quake-like movement and outrageous level design
  • Take a trip through the rich, twisted, ever-changing environments of POSTAL DUDE’S deranged mind
  • Shoot a variety of insane guns at some of the freakiest enemies to ever grace computer screens
  • Follow the all-original story line making the POSTAL-VERSE continuity even more effed-up than it was
  • Hear Corey Cruise returning as the POSTAL DUDE, with guest appearances from other fan-beloved voices
  • Enjoy the POSTAL series trademark dark, crude humor and glorification of fantasy violence

It’s a mad game for the mad times, kids! From the studio that brought you ELDERBORN and Blood West , comes the first-person shooter you didn't know you need in your life - POSTAL: Brain Damaged.

wildbastards.callout:
Build your crew and take on the most dangerous jobs in the galaxy. (Steam Deck Playable)

76% Positive on Steam
wildbastards.description_text:
From the veteran team behind Void Bastards and Card Hunter, Wild Bastards has you travel from planet to planet to recruit, manage and gun sling with a team of 13 outlaws, each of whom has their own weaponry, special power, and growth tree. On planets, you’ll wrangle loot and start showdowns that are then played out in intense, bite-sized shootouts.

The Wild Bastards were the most deadly gang in the galaxy until a posse from the puritanical magnate Jebediah Chaste eliminated one outlaw after another. Faced with their own mortality, the two remaining members have teamed up with the Drifter, a mysterious sentient spacecraft, to find and resurrect the dead gang members as they flee to the mythical Homestead.

Intense Showdowns
Prove you’re the ultimate gunslinger by blasting an array of enemies in bullet-flying shootouts.

Tactical FPS Combat
Use your wits to overcome crafty enemies that utilize cover, flank you, and employ a huge variety of special moves from teleportation to homing poisonous quills.

13 Outlaws to Play
Rebuild a gang of 13 outlaws, each with their own unique weapon, stunt, personality, relationships, and ability tree.

Build & Maintain Relationships
The gang know each other well, but that doesn’t mean they like each other. It’s your job to manage their dynamic relationships, but good luck getting feuding outlaws to ride together.

Keep The Gang Thriving
Accumulate resources to heal injured gang members, level up characters, improve relationships, and more.

Strategize for Victory
Evaluate each planet’s terrain, enemies, and traits before selecting which gang members you want to land there. Collect items, level up, and use special locations carefully to turn the odds in your favor!

An Ever-Changing, Lawless Galaxy
Roam the procedurally-generated galactic sectors and planets with varying parameters such as gravity, terrain features, weather, and more.

Challenge Mode
After completing the main campaign, a challenge mode unlocks to offer a sequence of challenge sectors with increasingly difficult levels and mutators to modify the play experience.

highonlife.callout:
Embark on an intergalactic bounty hunting adventure with talking guns. (Steam Deck Verified)

89% Positive on Steam

Get the High on Knife DLC on sale!
highonlife.description_text:
SUMMARY
Fresh out of high school with no job and no ambition, you’ve really got nothing going for you until an alien cartel that wants to get high off humanity invades Earth. Now, you and a team of charismatic talking guns must answer the hero's call and become the deadliest intergalactic bounty hunter the cosmos has ever seen.

Travel to a variety of biomes and locations across the cosmos, go up against the nefarious Garmantuous and his gang of goons, collect loot, meet unique characters, and more, in the latest comedy adventure from Squanch Games!

FEATURES
  • Rescue and team up with charismatic, talking guns to become the deadliest intergalactic bounty hunter the cosmos has ever seen.
  • Navigate dynamic and changing worlds that range from a jungle paradise, to a city built inside an asteroid, the hub of the cosmos.
  • Leverage the unique skills of each gun to go up against a variety of criminals as you track down the nefarious Garmantuous and his gang of alien goons.
  • Complete hunter challenges, meet weird, fun and hilarious characters, collect an array of alien technology, and more!

FAQ
  • Is this a VR game?
    Although many of Squanch’s previous titles were firmly rooted in VR, High On Life was built from the ground up for traditional flatscreen devices.
  • What type of game is this? Single player? Multiplayer?
    High On Life is single player only. There is no multiplayer.
  • Can my kids play? Can families play together?
    As this is a mature-rated title, we do not recommend it for children.
  • What languages will High On Life be available in?
    The game will be localized (text-only) in English, French, Italian, German, and Spanish.
  • Who is Squanch Games?
    Founded in 2016, Squanch Games develops comedic games for multiple platforms and devices. The studio’s mission is to create immersive content that people can lose themselves in for hours at a time, as well as shorter experiences that can be enjoyed with friends. Their latest title, Trover Saves the Universe, is currently available on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC, alongside other digital and VR titles such as Dr. Splorchy Presents: Space Heroes, Accounting and Accounting+.
  • Do you have any other games?
    Other games launched by Squanch include Trover Saves the Universe, Dr. Splorchy Presents: Space Heroes, Accounting and Accounting+.

rpgmakermv_sakan.description_text:
SAKAN, Perfect tool to make your own original Tileset SAKAN is built to let you create tilesets ready to use in RPG Maker MV.Using the thousand more parts delivered with SAKAN, you can customizing the tileset delivered with MV, or build your own original one, all without having to any dot by dot paiting. If you prefer you can indeed use the pen and write your own dot picture, or build up animations too.

Edited or new tiles can be used directly in RPG Maker MV As an official MV tool, SAKAN can be started directly from MV, and get access directly to the game you are building, letting you edit or add images to it. All provided templates are in MV format, and just following them will let you create resource for MV in the correct format with no additional hassle.

Over 1000 parts to make your original tiles Furnitures, food, buttons and gear are only the start of the huge variety of parts SAKAN puts at your disposition to make tiles. Adding to that a stamp feature, and color setting and you can make an infinite variety of tiles without having to resort to dot painting.This allow you to create tiles that lets you go around MV limits of 4 layers per tile, and really customize you scenery as much as you want on the fly.

Support to animated tiles SAKAN will help you create your animated tiles better than ever. Mastering the stamp and the color edition you can easily make tiles with parts moving, changing colors or any combination.

cthulhumythosadvlunaticwhispers.description_text: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of the Cthulhu Mythos with this 2D visual novel game featuring a thrilling TRPG-based experience! Roll the dice and use your skills and luck to escape the abandoned hospital, while experiencing the cosmic terror.

pixelgamemakermv-cardgamesample.human_name: Pixel Game Maker MV - Cardgame Sample
pixelgamemakermv-cardgamesample.description_text:
This is a sample project of a battle-type card game created with Pixel Game Maker MV.

Basic Rules: - Your unit is on the right and your enemy is the unit on the left - The numbers on the unit represent stamina, attack points, and defense points. - At the beginning of the game, you are dealt three cards. - The sword card is for attack, and the shield card is for defense. - You can choose any one of them and then you start the attack phase. - The damage is the number of your opponent’s attack points minus your defense points. - If the player and enemy are still alive, the next turn commences and a card is dealt. - This continues until either you or your opponent’s stamina reaches zero. - For more information on how to make and play the game, visit the tutorial section in Object.

rpgmaker_vxace.description_text: RPG MAKER lets you create an original role-playing game without any prior specialized knowledge or training. RPG MAKER XP is full of the functions you've been asking for, including game data encryption and a scripting feature that lets you change the very heart of the RPG MAKER engine.

pixelgamemakermv-2dside-scrollershooting.human_name: Pixel Game Maker MV -2D Side-scroller Shooting Game Sample Project
pixelgamemakermv-2dside-scrollershooting.description_text:
This sample game is a simple 2D side-scroller shooting game. Please use the objects for reference. All materials included in this project can be used freely.

Your vehicle can fire normal shots and perform a close-range attack combined with a dodge technique, and you can also capture enemies and use bombs for wider-ranged attacks as well. If your energy hits 0, you'll have to restart from the beginning of the stage, but if you're touching a flag, you can restart from that point. Your score, energy level, and number of bombs are displayed onscreen.

●Controls (Xinput-compatible controllers) Up/Down/Left/Right: Move B: Normal Shot Y: Close-range Attack (combined with Dodge) X: Bomb A: Capture Enemy (optional when touching an enemy)

rpgmakeruniteadd-on_3ddungeon.description_text: This product is an add-on that allows you to switch existing top-down maps in RPG Maker Unite to 3D views. 3D map creation can be achieved using the map creation feature of the existing RPG Maker. Enabling this add-on in RPG Maker Unite will automatically switch to a 3D display.

childsplay.description_text:
Donations to support Child's Play Charity are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The Child's Play Charity works to channel the goodwill of the worldwide gaming community into video games and game systems for sick children in hospitals. Child's Play works directly with hospitals worldwide to identify what kinds of games and systems can be installed in hospital wards and distributed "for keeps" to child patients. Since 2003, Child's Play has coordinated the donation of millions of dollars of games and game systems, making them a premier charity for helping children in need of the joy that games can bring.

pixelgamemakermv.description_text:
Make action, adventure, shoot-‘em-ups... even multiplayer (up to four players!) games can be created with ease! Have a great idea for a game, but don’t have anyone to pitch it to, or any programming experience? Now with Pixel Game Maker MV, you can turn that idea into an actual, playable game with nothing but a PC and this software! Make the games you want to play, the way you want to play them: side-scrolling action platformers, top-down adventure/RPGs, multiplayer VS. battles, racing, puzzles, pinball, shoot-‘em-ups, horror, Metroidvania... You name it, you can make it in the style and genre of your choice!

Simple enough even for total beginners! The basic controls and functions are extremely simple and easy to pick up. Create pixel-based animations, and set up your game map. Create objects, decide how you want them to move, and then simply add them to the scene in which you want to use them. Just follow these simple steps, and you can create an entire game just like that! Feel free to try rearranging and adjusting the various steps and processes to see what sort of unique games and mechanics you can create!

Includes all the samples and materials you’ll need to get started: character animations, tiles, music, and more! PGMMV is packaged together with all sorts of materials and samples that you can freely use, combine, and tweak to make whatever sort of game you can like. You can even mix and match the preloaded materials with your own creations; for example, using them as simple guides to create the pixel animations yourself from scratch and then combining them with included sample maps and music. This makes it even easier to create and expand upon games of virtually any genre!

Take advantage of various plug-ins to expand the creative possibilities even further! For more advanced users, try using JavaScript plug-ins to create even more complex and detailed actions, animations, and full games! While no programming or scripting ability is necessary to create games and the various elements required, user-created plug-ins and scripts will allow you to take your creations to the next level – and far beyond. Not only can you freely distribute your games as you like, but you can even distribute them for profit through Gotcha Gotcha Games and the Nintendo Switch!

Not only can you make your own games in any way you like, with Pixel Game Maker MV you are also able to freely distribute your creations however you see fit. You are even free to sell your games on any PC gaming platform and in any region in the world! And that’s not all – Gotcha Gotcha Games has begun publishing and distribution of PGMMV-developed titles on the Nintendo Switch. This means that not only will you be able to play your games on the Nintendo Switch, but distribute and sell them on the console, too!
